ValidationRule.description: Domain field must contain a valid Domain without http://, https://, or www. at beginning or trailing slash (/) at end. Version 2
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISNEW() && !ISBLANK(Domain__c) && ISBLANK(Lead_ID__c) && !ISPICKVAL(Lead_Source__c,"ZoomInfo") && OR( !CONTAINS(Domain__c,"."), !REGEX(Domain__c,"^([a-zA-Z0-9]|-)+?([.][a-zA-Z0-9(-|/|=|?)??]+?)+?$"), CONTAINS(Domain__c,"http://"), CONTAINS(Domain__c,"https://"), CONTAINS(Domain__c,"www."), RIGHT(Domain__c,1)="/" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Domain field must contain a valid Domain without http://, https://, or www. at beginning or trailing slash (/) at end.
